database.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.my_attempt}` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `ip` varchar(40) NOT NULL, `count` int(10) NOT NULL, `date` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `ip` (`ip`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.my_contact}` ( `id` INT(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `status` INT(10) NOT NULL, `type` ENUM('EMAIL','XMPP') NOT NULL, `value` VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, `date` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.my_notify}` ( `id` INT(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `serviceId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `contactId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `status` INT(10) NOT NULL, `date` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `serviceContactId` (`serviceId`,`contactId`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.my_subscription}` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `status` INT(10) NOT NULL, `hub` VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, `topic` VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, `leaseSeconds` INT(10), `secret` VARCHAR(40), `verifyToken` VARCHAR(32), `date` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
